ROW.COLUMN: UPDATE LBM_VENTE_POSTE V SET TOPGU = 2 WHERE STECAISSE IN (1, 2) AND APPL = 'SAP' AND ROWNUM <= :B3 AND HCA IS NULL AND DEPARTEMENT = :B2 AND ( (TYPEGEST != '5' AND TYPEGEST != '6' AND :B1 = 'F') OR ((TYPEGEST = '5' OR TYPEGEST = '6') AND :B1 = 'G') ) AND TOPGU = 0 AND NUMCDECLT IS NULL AND TRUNC (DATEHTRANS) = (SELECT TRUNC (DATEHTRANS) FROM (SELECT DATEHTRANS FROM LBM_VENTE_POSTE V LEFT JOIN LBM_CP_HISTO H ON V.CP = H.CP WHERE STECAISSE IN (1, 2) AND V.APPL = 'SAP' AND V.HCA IS NULL AND DEPARTEMENT = :B2 AND ( ( V.TYPEGEST != '5' AND V.TYPEGEST != '6' AND :B1 = 'F' ) OR ( (V.TYPEGEST = '5' OR V.TYPEGEST = '6') AND :B1 = 'G' ) ) AND TOPGU = 0 AND ( (DATEHTRANS < H.DATEBLOCAGEINVENTAIRE) OR (H.DATEBLOCAGEINVENTAIRE IS NULL) AND NUMCDECLT IS NULL ) ORDER BY DATEHTRANS) WHERE ROWNUM <= 1) AND ( (DATEHTRANS < (SELECT DATEBLOCAGEINVENTAIRE FROM LBM_CP_HISTO H WHERE H.CP = V.CP)) OR ((SELECT DATEBLOCAGEINVENTAIRE FROM LBM_CP_HISTO H WHERE H.CP = V.CP) IS NULL) )

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM lbm_vente_poste v WHERE stecaisse IN (1, 2) AND appl = 'SAP' AND hca IS NULL AND departement = '742' AND (v.typegest = '5' OR v.typegest = '6') AND topgu = 0 AND numcdeclt IS NULL AND TRUNC (datehtrans) = (SELECT TRUNC (datehtrans) FROM (SELECT datehtrans FROM lbm_vente_poste v2 LEFT JOIN lbm_cp_histo h ON v2.cp = h.cp WHERE stecaisse IN (1, 2) AND v2.appl = 'SAP' AND v2.hca IS NULL AND departement = '742' AND (v2.typegest = '5' OR v2.typegest = '6') AND topgu = 0 AND ( (datehtrans < h.dateblocageinventaire) OR (h.dateblocageinventaire IS NULL) AND numcdeclt IS NULL ) ORDER BY datehtrans) WHERE ROWNUM <= 1) AND ( (datehtrans < (SELECT dateblocageinventaire FROM lbm_cp_histo h WHERE h.cp = v.cp)) OR ((SELECT dateblocageinventaire FROM lbm_cp_histo h WHERE h.cp = v.cp) IS NULL) )

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM lbm_vente_poste v WHERE stecaisse IN (1, 2) AND appl = 'SAP' AND hca IS NULL AND departement = '750' AND (v.typegest = '5' OR v.typegest = '6') AND topgu = 0 AND numcdeclt IS NULL AND TRUNC (datehtrans) = (SELECT TRUNC (datehtrans) FROM (SELECT datehtrans FROM lbm_vente_poste v2 LEFT JOIN lbm_cp_histo h ON v2.cp = h.cp WHERE stecaisse IN (1, 2) AND v2.appl = 'SAP' AND v2.hca IS NULL AND departement = '750' AND (v2.typegest = '5' OR v2.typegest = '6') AND topgu = 0 AND ( (datehtrans < h.dateblocageinventaire) OR (h.dateblocageinventaire IS NULL) AND numcdeclt IS NULL ) ORDER BY datehtrans) WHERE ROWNUM <= 1) AND ( (datehtrans < (SELECT dateblocageinventaire FROM lbm_cp_histo h WHERE h.cp = v.cp)) OR ((SELECT dateblocageinventaire FROM lbm_cp_histo h WHERE h.cp = v.cp) IS NULL) )

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM lbm_vente_poste v WHERE stecaisse IN (1, 2) AND appl = 'SAP' AND hca IS NULL AND departement = '750' AND (v.typegest != '5' AND v.typegest != '6') AND topgu = 0 AND numcdeclt IS NULL AND TRUNC (datehtrans) = (SELECT TRUNC (datehtrans) FROM (SELECT datehtrans FROM lbm_vente_poste v2 LEFT JOIN lbm_cp_histo h ON v2.cp = h.cp WHERE stecaisse IN (1, 2) AND v2.appl = 'SAP' AND v2.hca IS NULL AND departement = '750' AND (v2.typegest != '5' AND v2.typegest != '6') AND topgu = 0 AND ( (datehtrans < h.dateblocageinventaire) OR (h.dateblocageinventaire IS NULL) AND numcdeclt IS NULL ) ORDER BY datehtrans) WHERE ROWNUM <= 1) AND ( (datehtrans < (SELECT dateblocageinventaire FROM lbm_cp_histo h WHERE h.cp = v.cp)) OR ((SELECT dateblocageinventaire FROM lbm_cp_histo h WHERE h.cp = v.cp) IS NULL) )

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM lbm_vente_poste v WHERE stecaisse IN (1, 2) AND appl = 'SAP' AND hca IS NULL AND departement = '740' AND (v.typegest != '5' AND v.typegest != '6') AND topgu = 0 AND numcdeclt IS NULL AND TRUNC (datehtrans) = (SELECT TRUNC (datehtrans) FROM (SELECT datehtrans FROM lbm_vente_poste v2 LEFT JOIN lbm_cp_histo h ON v2.cp = h.cp WHERE stecaisse IN (1, 2) AND v2.appl = 'SAP' AND v2.hca IS NULL AND departement = '740' AND (v2.typegest != '5' AND v2.typegest != '6') AND topgu = 0 AND ( (datehtrans < h.dateblocageinventaire) OR (h.dateblocageinventaire IS NULL) AND numcdeclt IS NULL ) ORDER BY datehtrans) WHERE ROWNUM <= 1) AND ( (datehtrans < (SELECT dateblocageinventaire FROM lbm_cp_histo h WHERE h.cp = v.cp)) OR ((SELECT dateblocageinventaire FROM lbm_cp_histo h WHERE h.cp = v.cp) IS NULL) )

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM lbm_vente_poste v WHERE stecaisse IN (1, 2) AND appl = 'SAP' AND hca IS NULL AND departement = '721' AND (v.typegest != '5' AND v.typegest != '6') AND topgu = 0 AND numcdeclt IS NULL AND TRUNC (datehtrans) = (SELECT TRUNC (datehtrans) FROM (SELECT datehtrans FROM lbm_vente_poste v2 LEFT JOIN lbm_cp_histo h ON v2.cp = h.cp WHERE stecaisse IN (1, 2) AND v2.appl = 'SAP' AND v2.hca IS NULL AND departement = '721' AND (v2.typegest != '5' AND v2.typegest != '6') AND topgu = 0 AND ( (datehtrans < h.dateblocageinventaire) OR (h.dateblocageinventaire IS NULL) AND numcdeclt IS NULL ) ORDER BY datehtrans) WHERE ROWNUM <= 1) AND ( (datehtrans < (SELECT dateblocageinventaire FROM lbm_cp_histo h WHERE h.cp = v.cp)) OR ((SELECT dateblocageinventaire FROM lbm_cp_histo h WHERE h.cp = v.cp) IS NULL) )

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM lbm_vente_poste v WHERE stecaisse IN (1, 2) AND appl = 'SAP' AND hca IS NULL AND departement = '738' AND (v.typegest = '5' OR v.typegest = '6') AND topgu = 0 AND numcdeclt IS NULL AND TRUNC (datehtrans) = (SELECT TRUNC (datehtrans) FROM (SELECT datehtrans FROM lbm_vente_poste v2 LEFT JOIN lbm_cp_histo h ON v2.cp = h.cp WHERE stecaisse IN (1, 2) AND v2.appl = 'SAP' AND v2.hca IS NULL AND departement = '738' AND (v2.typegest = '5' OR v2.typegest = '6') AND topgu = 0 AND ( (datehtrans < h.dateblocageinventaire) OR (h.dateblocageinventaire IS NULL) AND numcdeclt IS NULL ) ORDER BY datehtrans) WHERE ROWNUM <= 1) AND ( (datehtrans < (SELECT dateblocageinventaire FROM lbm_cp_histo h WHERE h.cp = v.cp)) OR ((SELECT dateblocageinventaire FROM lbm_cp_histo h WHERE h.cp = v.cp) IS NULL) )

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM lbm_vente_poste v WHERE (TRUNC (datehtrans), numcdeclt, departement) = (SELECT TRUNC (datehtrans) AS datehtrans, numcdeclt AS numcdeclt, departement AS departement FROM (SELECT v2.datehtrans AS datehtrans, numcdeclt AS numcdeclt, departement AS departement FROM lbm_vente_poste v2 INNER JOIN lbm_commande_entete c ON v2.numcdeclt = c.numcdecli LEFT JOIN lbm_cp_histo h ON v2.cp = h.cp WHERE v2.stecaisse = '1' AND v2.appl = 'SAP' AND v2.hca IS NULL AND (v2.typegest != '5' AND v2.typegest != '6')
AND topgu = 0 AND ( (v2.datehtrans < h.dateblocageinventaire) OR (h.dateblocageinventaire IS NULL) ) AND numcdeclt IS NOT NULL ORDER BY v2.datehtrans ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 1) AND stecaisse = '1' AND appl = 'SAP' AND hca IS NULL AND (v.typegest != '5' AND v.typegest != '6' )
AND topgu = 0 AND ( (datehtrans < (SELECT dateblocageinventaire FROM lbm_cp_histo h WHERE h.cp = v.cp AND ROWNUM <= 1)) OR ((SELECT dateblocageinventaire FROM lbm_cp_histo h WHERE h.cp = v.cp AND ROWNUM <= 1) IS NULL) )

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM lbm_vente_poste v WHERE stecaisse IN (1, 2) AND appl = 'SAP' AND hca IS NULL AND departement = '740' AND (v.typegest = '5' OR v.typegest = '6') AND topgu = 0 AND numcdeclt IS NULL AND TRUNC (datehtrans) = (SELECT TRUNC (datehtrans) FROM (SELECT datehtrans FROM lbm_vente_poste v2 LEFT JOIN lbm_cp_histo h ON v2.cp = h.cp WHERE stecaisse IN (1, 2) AND v2.appl = 'SAP' AND v2.hca IS NULL AND departement = '740' AND (v2.typegest = '5' OR v2.typegest = '6') AND topgu = 0 AND ( (datehtrans < h.dateblocageinventaire) OR (h.dateblocageinventaire IS NULL) AND numcdeclt IS NULL ) ORDER BY datehtrans) WHERE ROWNUM <= 1) AND ( (datehtrans < (SELECT dateblocageinventaire FROM lbm_cp_histo h WHERE h.cp = v.cp)) OR ((SELECT dateblocageinventaire FROM lbm_cp_histo h WHERE h.cp = v.cp) IS NULL) )

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM lbm_vente_poste v WHERE (TRUNC (datehtrans), numcdeclt, departement) = (SELECT TRUNC (datehtrans) AS datehtrans, numcdeclt AS numcdeclt, departement AS departement FROM (SELECT v2.datehtrans AS datehtrans, numcdeclt AS numcdeclt, departement AS departement FROM lbm_vente_poste v2 INNER JOIN lbm_commande_entete c ON v2.numcdeclt = c.numcdecli LEFT JOIN lbm_cp_histo h ON v2.cp = h.cp WHERE v2.stecaisse = '1' AND v2.appl = 'SAP' AND v2.hca IS NULL AND (v2.typegest = '5' OR v2.typegest = '6')
AND topgu = 0 AND ( (v2.datehtrans < h.dateblocageinventaire) OR (h.dateblocageinventaire IS NULL) ) AND numcdeclt IS NOT NULL ORDER BY v2.datehtrans ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 1) AND stecaisse = '1' AND appl = 'SAP' AND hca IS NULL AND (v.typegest = '5' OR v.typegest = '6' )
AND topgu = 0 AND ( (datehtrans < (SELECT dateblocageinventaire FROM lbm_cp_histo h WHERE h.cp = v.cp AND ROWNUM <= 1)) OR ((SELECT dateblocageinventaire FROM lbm_cp_histo h WHERE h.cp = v.cp AND ROWNUM <= 1) IS NULL) )

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM lbm_vente_poste v WHERE stecaisse IN (1, 2) AND appl = 'SAP' AND hca IS NULL AND departement = '741' AND (v.typegest != '5' AND v.typegest != '6') AND topgu = 0 AND numcdeclt IS NULL AND TRUNC (datehtrans) = (SELECT TRUNC (datehtrans) FROM (SELECT datehtrans FROM lbm_vente_poste v2 LEFT JOIN lbm_cp_histo h ON v2.cp = h.cp WHERE stecaisse IN (1, 2) AND v2.appl = 'SAP' AND v2.hca IS NULL AND departement = '741' AND (v2.typegest != '5' AND v2.typegest != '6') AND topgu = 0 AND ( (datehtrans < h.dateblocageinventaire) OR (h.dateblocageinventaire IS NULL) AND numcdeclt IS NULL ) ORDER BY datehtrans) WHERE ROWNUM <= 1) AND ( (datehtrans < (SELECT dateblocageinventaire FROM lbm_cp_histo h WHERE h.cp = v.cp)) OR ((SELECT dateblocageinventaire FROM lbm_cp_histo h WHERE h.cp = v.cp) IS NULL) )

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM lbm_vente_poste v WHERE stecaisse IN (1, 2) AND appl = 'SAP' AND hca IS NULL AND departement = '738' AND (v.typegest != '5' AND v.typegest != '6') AND topgu = 0 AND numcdeclt IS NULL AND TRUNC (datehtrans) = (SELECT TRUNC (datehtrans) FROM (SELECT datehtrans FROM lbm_vente_poste v2 LEFT JOIN lbm_cp_histo h ON v2.cp = h.cp WHERE stecaisse IN (1, 2) AND v2.appl = 'SAP' AND v2.hca IS NULL AND departement = '738' AND (v2.typegest != '5' AND v2.typegest != '6') AND topgu = 0 AND ( (datehtrans < h.dateblocageinventaire) OR (h.dateblocageinventaire IS NULL) AND numcdeclt IS NULL ) ORDER BY datehtrans) WHERE ROWNUM <= 1) AND ( (datehtrans < (SELECT dateblocageinventaire FROM lbm_cp_histo h WHERE h.cp = v.cp)) OR ((SELECT dateblocageinventaire FROM lbm_cp_histo h WHERE h.cp = v.cp) IS NULL) )

SELECT COUNT (*) FROM lbm_vente_poste v WHERE appl = 'TIT' AND hca IS NULL AND topgu = 0 AND LENGTH (TRIM (TRANSLATE (eansaisie, '0123456789', ' '))) IS NULL AND eansaisie IS NOT NULL AND ( (datehtrans < (SELECT dateblocageinventaire FROM lbm_cp_histo h WHERE h.cp = v.cp)) OR ((SELECT dateblocageinventaire FROM lbm_cp_histo h WHERE h.cp = v.cp) IS NULL) )

SELECT 'ENTETE' AS NOMTABLE, E.STECAISSE AS STECAISSE, E.DATEHTRANS AS DATEHTRANS, E.NUMCAISSE AS NUMCAISSE, E.NUMCAISSIERTRANS AS NUMCAISSIERTRANS, E.NUMTICKET AS NUMTICKET, E.EXPORT AS EXPORT, CASE WHEN E.NUMCARTEPRIV LIKE '925054%' THEN '0' ELSE E.NUMCLT END AS NUMCLT, E.CANETTTC AS CANETTTC, E.ESCPT AS ESCPT, E.NUMCARTEPRIV AS NUMCARTEPRIV, E.DATEHTOPCA AS DATEHTOPCA, NULL AS NUMLIGNE, NULL AS CODEVEND, NULL AS EANSAISIE, NULL AS CP, NULL AS PRIXTTCART, NULL AS CANETLIGNE, NULL AS APPL, NULL AS TYPEGEST, NULL AS NUMCDECLT, NULL AS TOTREMRED, NULL AS TVATAUX, NULL AS TVAMONT, NULL AS TVAMONTREM, NULL AS QTE, NULL AS PR, NULL AS REDUCTOTAL, NULL AS ESCMONT, NULL AS REDUCTYPE, NULL AS REMISETYPE, NULL AS REMMANUELLE, NULL AS NUMPLAN, NULL AS HCA, NULL AS ACTMARKLIBREDUIT, NULL AS ACTMARKCODEDUTYPE, NULL AS DATHTOPGU, NULL AS TOPARCH, NULL AS DATEHTRANSAC, NULL AS NUMLIGPAIE, NULL AS NUMCERTIFCHQ, NULL AS NUMAUTOCB, NULL AS PAIEMODE, NULL AS PAIEMONTDEV, NULL AS DEV, NULL AS PAIEMONTDEVSTE, NULL AS NUMIDMOYPAIE,NULL AS DEPARTEMENT, NULL AS EXPMONT, NULL AS MOTIFRETOUR, NULL AS TRANSACOFFLINE, NULL AS NUMFACTURE, NULL AS TICKETCHANGE, NVL (DELAIARTICLE, 0) AS DELAIARTICLE, NVL (DELAIPAIEMENT, 0) AS DELAIPAIEMENT, NULL AS NUMATTRIBUT, NULL AS VALEURATTRIBUT FROM LBM_VENTE_ENTETE E LEFT JOIN LBM_VENTE_ATTRIBUTS ATT ON E.STECAISSE = ATT.STECAISSE AND E.DATEHTRANS = ATT.DATEHTRANS AND E.NUMCAISSE = ATT.NUMCAISSE AND E.NUMTICKET = ATT.NUMTICKET WHERE E.TOPCA = 4 UNION SELECT 'POSTE' AS NOMTABLE, P.STECAISSE AS STECAISSE, P.DATEHTRANS AS DATEHTRANS, P.NUMCAISSE AS NUMCAISSE, NULL AS NUMCAISSIERTRANS, P.NUMTICKET AS NUMTICKET, NULL AS EXPORT, NULL AS NUMCLT, NULL AS CANETTTC, NULL AS ESCPT, NULL AS NUMCARTEPRIV, NULL AS DATEHTOPCA, P.NUMLIGNE AS NUMLIGNE, P.CODEVEND AS CODEVEND, P.EANSAISIE AS EANSAISIE, P.CP AS CP, P.PRIXTTCART AS PRIXTTCART, P.CANETLIGNE AS CANETLIGNE, P.APPL AS APPL, P.TYPEGEST AS TYPEGEST, P.NUMCDECLT AS NUMCDECLT, NVL (P.TOTREMRED, 0) AS TOTREMRED, P.TVATAUX AS TVATAUX, P.TVAMONT AS TVAMONT, (NVL (P.TOTREMRED, 0) - NVL (P.TOTREMREDHT, 0) ) AS TVAMONTREM, P.QTE AS QTE, NVL(P.PR,0) AS PR, P.REDUCTOTAL AS REDUCTOTAL, NVL (P.ESCMONT, 0) AS ESCMONT, P.REDUCTYPE AS REDUCTYPE, P.REMISETYPE AS REMISETYPE, P.REMMANUELLE AS REMMANUELLE, P.NUMPLAN AS NUMPLAN, P.HCA AS HCA, P.ACTMARKLIBREDUIT AS ACTMARKLIBREDUIT, P.ACTMARKCODEDUTYPE AS ACTMARKCODEDUTYPE, P.DATHTOPGU AS DATHTOPGU, P.TOPARCH AS TOPARCH, NULL AS DATEHTRANSAC, NULL AS NUMLIGPAIE, NULL AS NUMCERTIFCHQ, NULL AS NUMAUTOCB, NULL AS PAIEMODE, NULL AS PAIEMONTDEV, NULL AS DEV, NULL AS PAIEMONTDEVSTE, NULL AS NUMIDMOYPAIE, P.DEPARTEMENT AS DEPARTEMENT, NVL (P.EXPMONT, 0) AS EXPMONT, MOTIFRETOUR AS MOTIFRETOUR, NULL AS TRANSACOFFLINE, NULL AS NUMFACTURE, NULL AS TICKETCHANGE, NULL AS DELAIARTICLE, NULL AS DELAIPAIEMENT, NULL AS NUMATTRIBUT, NULL AS VALEURATTRIBUT FROM LBM_VENTE_POSTE P INNER JOIN LBM_VENTE_ENTETE E ON P.STECAISSE = E.STECAISSE AND P.DATEHTRANS = E.DATEHTRANS AND P.NUMCAISSE = E.NUMCAISSE AND P.NUMTICKET = E.NUMTICKET WHERE E.TOPCA = 4 UNION SELECT 'PAIEM' AS NOMTABLE, R.STECAISSE AS STECAISSE, NULL AS DATEHTRANS, R.NUMCAISSE AS NUMCAISSE, R.NUMCAISSIERTRANS AS NUMCAISSIERTRANS, R.NUMTICKET AS NUMTICKET, NULL AS EXPORT, NULL AS NUMCLT, NULL AS CANETTTC, NULL AS ESCPT, NULL AS NUMCARTEPRIV, NULL AS DATEHTOPCA, NULL AS NUMLIGNE, NULL AS CODEVEND, NULL AS EANSAISIE, NULL AS CP, NULL AS PRIXTTCART, NULL AS CANETLIGNE, NULL AS APPL, NULL AS TYPEGEST, NULL AS NUMCDECLT, NULL AS TOTREMRED, NULL AS TVATAUX, NULL AS TVAMONT, NULL AS TVAMONTREM, NULL AS QTE, NULL AS PR, NULL AS REDUCTOTAL, NULL AS ESCMONT, NULL AS REDUCTYPE, NULL AS REMISETYPE, NULL AS REMMANUELLE, NULL AS NUMPLAN, NULL AS HCA, NULL AS ACTMARKLIBREDUIT, NULL AS ACTMARKCODEDUTYPE, NULL AS DATHTOPGU, NULL AS TOPARCH, R.DATEHTRANSAC AS DATEHTRANSAC, R.NUMLIGPAIE AS NUMLIGPAIE, R.NUMCERTIFCHQ AS NUMCERTIFCHQ, R.NUMAUTOCB AS NUMAUTOCB, R.PAIEMODE AS PAIEMODE, R.PAIEMONTDEV AS PAIEMONTDEV, R.DEV AS DEV, R.PAIEMONTDEVSTE AS PAIEMONTDEVSTE, R.NUMIDMOYPAIE AS NUMIDMOYPAIE, NULL AS DEPARTEMENT, NULL AS EXPMONT, NULL AS MOTIFRETOUR, R.TRANSACOFFLINE AS TRANSACOFFLINE, R.NUMFACTURE AS NUMFACTURE, R.TICKETCHANGE AS TICKETCHANGE, NULL AS DELAIARTICLE, NULL AS DELAIPAIEMENT, NULL AS NUMATTRIBUT, NULL AS VALEURATTRIBUT FROM LBM_VENTE_REGLEMENT R INNER JOIN LBM_VENTE_ENTETE E ON R.STECAISSE = E.STECAISSE AND R.DATEHTRANSAC = E.DATEHTRANS AND R.NUMCAISSE = E.NUMCAISSE AND R.NUMTICKET = E.NUMTICKET WHERE E.TOPCA = 4 UNION SELECT 'LIGACTMKT' AS NOMTABLE, AC.STECAISSE AS STECAISSE, AC.DATEHTRANSAC AS DATEHTRANS, AC.NUMCAISSE AS NUMCAISSE, NULL AS NUMCAISSIERTRANS, AC.NUMTICKET AS NUMTICKET, NULL AS EXPORT, NULL AS NUMCLT, NULL AS CANETTTC, NULL AS ESCPT, NULL AS NUMCARTEPRIV, NULL AS DATEHTOPCA, AC.NUMLIGAMKT AS NUMLIGNE, NULL AS CODEVEND, NULL AS EANSAISIE, NULL AS CP, NULL AS PRIXTTCART, NULL AS CANETLIGNE, NULL AS APPL, NULL AS TYPEGEST, NULL AS NUMCDECLT, AC.REMREDTTCMKT AS TOTREMRED, NULL AS TVATAUX, NULL AS TVAMONT, NULL AS TVAMONTREM, NULL AS QTE, NULL AS PR, NULL AS REDUCTOTAL, NULL AS ESCMONT, NULL AS REDUCTYPE, NULL AS REMISETYPE, NULL AS REMMANUELLE, NULL AS NUMPLAN, NULL AS HCA, AC.CODEACTIONMKT AS ACTMARKLIBREDUIT, NULL AS ACTMARKCODEDUTYPE, NULL AS DATHTOPGU, NULL AS TOPARCH, NULL AS DATEHTRANSAC, NULL AS NUMLIGPAIE, NULL AS NUMCERTIFCHQ, NULL AS NUMAUTOCB, NULL AS PAIEMODE, NULL AS PAIEMONTDEV, NULL AS DEV, NULL AS PAIEMONTDEVSTE, NULL AS NUMIDMOYPAIE, NULL AS DEPARTEMENT, NULL AS EXPMONT, NULL AS MOTIFRETOUR, NULL AS TRANSACOFFLINE, NULL AS NUMFACTURE, NULL AS TICKETCHANGE, NULL AS DELAIARTICLE, NULL AS DELAIPAIEMENT, NULL AS NUMATTRIBUT, NULL AS VALEURATTRIBUT FROM LBM_VENTE_ACT_MKT AC INNER JOIN LBM_VENTE_ENTETE E ON AC.STECAISSE = E.STECAISSE AND AC.DATEHTRANSAC = E.DATEHTRANS AND AC.NUMCAISSE = E.NUMCAISSE AND AC.NUMTICKET = E.NUMTICKET WHERE E.TOPCA = 4 UNION SELECT 'LIGACTMKTREP' AS NOMTABLE, ACR.STECAISSE AS STECAISSE, ACR.DATEHTRANSAC AS DATEHTRANS, ACR.NUMCAISSE AS NUMCAISSE, NULL AS NUMCAISSIERTRANS, ACR.NUMTICKET AS NUMTICKET, NULL AS EXPORT, NULL AS NUMCLT, NULL AS CANETTTC, NULL AS ESCPT, NULL AS NUMCARTEPRIV, NULL AS DATEHTOPCA, NULL AS NUMLIGNE, ACR.CODEQUESTION AS CODEVEND, ACR.VALEUR AS EANSAISIE, NULL AS CP, NULL AS PRIXTTCART, NULL AS CANETLIGNE, NULL AS APPL, NULL AS TYPEGEST, NULL AS NUMCDECLT, NULL AS TOTREMRED, NULL AS TVATAUX, NULL AS TVAMONT, NULL AS TVAMONTREM, ACR.CODEELEMENT AS QTE, NULL AS PR, NULL AS REDUCTOTAL, NULL AS ESCMONT, NULL AS REDUCTYPE, NULL AS REMISETYPE, NULL AS REMMANUELLE, NULL AS NUMPLAN, NULL AS HCA, ACR.CODEACTIONMKT AS ACTMARKLIBREDUIT, NULL AS ACTMARKCODEDUTYPE, NULL AS DATHTOPGU, NULL AS TOPARCH, NULL AS DATEHTRANSAC, NULL AS NUMLIGPAIE, NULL AS NUMCERTIFCHQ, NULL AS NUMAUTOCB, NULL AS PAIEMODE, NULL AS PAIEMONTDEV, NULL AS DEV, NULL AS PAIEMONTDEVSTE, NULL AS NUMIDMOYPAIE, NULL AS DEPARTEMENT, NULL AS EXPMONT, NULL AS MOTIFRETOUR, NULL AS TRANSACOFFLINE, NULL AS NUMFACTURE, NULL AS TICKETCHANGE, NULL AS DELAIARTICLE, NULL AS DELAIPAIEMENT, NULL AS NUMATTRIBUT, NULL AS VALEURATTRIBUT FROM LBM_VENTE_ACT_MKT_REPONSES ACR INNER JOIN LBM_VENTE_ENTETE E ON ACR.STECAISSE = E.STECAISSE AND ACR.DATEHTRANSAC = E.DATEHTRANS AND ACR.NUMCAISSE = E.NUMCAISSE AND ACR.NUMTICKET = E.NUMTICKET WHERE E.TOPCA = 4 UNION SELECT 'LIGATTRIBUT' AS NOMTABLE,ATT.STECAISSE AS STECAISSE, ATT.DATEHTRANS AS DATEHTRANS, ATT.NUMCAISSE AS NUMCAISSE, NULL AS NUMCAISSIERTRANS, ATT.NUMTICKET AS NUMTICKET, NULL AS EXPORT, NULL AS NUMCLT, NULL AS CANETTTC, NULL AS ESCPT, NULL AS NUMCARTEPRIV, NULL AS DATEHTOPCA, NULL AS NUMLIGNE, NULL AS CODEVEND, NULL AS EANSAISIE, NULL AS CP, NULL AS PRIXTTCART, NULL AS CANETLIGNE, NULL AS APPL, NULL AS TYPEGEST, NULL AS NUMCDECLT, NULL AS TOTREMRED, NULL AS TVATAUX, NULL AS TVAMONT, NULL AS TVAMONTREM, NULL AS QTE, NULL AS PR, NULL AS REDUCTOTAL, NULL AS ESCMONT, NULL AS REDUCTYPE, NULL AS REMISETYPE, NULL AS REMMANUELLE, NULL AS NUMPLAN, NULL AS HCA, NULL AS ACTMARKLIBREDUIT, NULL AS ACTMARKCODEDUTYPE, NULL AS DATHTOPGU, NULL AS TOPARCH, NULL AS DATEHTRANSAC, NULL AS NUMLIGPAIE, NULL AS NUMCERTIFCHQ, NULL AS NUMAUTOCB, NULL AS PAIEMODE, NULL AS PAIEMONTDEV, NULL AS DEV, NULL AS PAIEMONTDEVSTE, NULL AS NUMIDMOYPAIE, NULL AS DEPARTEMENT, NULL AS EXPMONT, NULL AS MOTIFRETOUR, NULL AS TRANSACOFFLINE, NULL AS NUMFACTURE, NULL AS TICKETCHANGE, NULL AS DELAIARTICLE, NULL AS DELAIPAIEMENT, ATT.NUMATTRIBUT AS NUMATTRIBUT, ATT.VALEUR AS VALEURATTRIBUT FROM LBM_VENTE_ATTRIBUTS ATT INNER JOIN LBM_VENTE_ENTETE E ON ATT.STECAISSE = E.STECAISSE AND ATT.DATEHTRANS = E.DATEHTRANS AND ATT.NUMCAISSE = E.NUMCAISSE AND ATT.NUMTICKET = E.NUMTICKET WHERE E.TOPCA = 4
SELECT LCLI.NUMID FROM LBM_CLIENTS LCLI INNER JOIN LBM_MESSAGE_ID LMI ON LMI.ID_MESSAGE=LCLI.MESSAGEID AND LMI.ID_BATCH_STL = :B1 FOR UPDATE

INSERT INTO LBM_INT_CLIENTS SELECT NVL (LCLI.CODEMAGASIN, '999'), NVL (LCLI.CODEMAGASIN, '999'), LBM_RETOURNE_CODECLIENT(LCLI.NUMID, LCLI.TYPERECHERCHE,LCLI.APPLISOURCE), SUBSTR (LCLI.NOM, 1,25), SUBSTR (LCLI.NOM2,1,25) , SUBSTR(LCLI.PRENOM,1,20) , LCLI.CODELANGUE, LCLI.TELEPHONE, LCLI.TELMOBILE, LCLI.RECRUTEUR, LCLI.CIVILITE, SUBSTR (TO_CHAR (LCLI.DATENAISSANCE, 'DD/MM/YYYY'), 1, 2), SUBSTR (TO_CHAR (LCLI.DATENAISSANCE, 'DD/MM/YYYY'), 4, 2), SUBSTR (TO_CHAR (LCLI.DATENAISSANCE, 'DD/MM/YYYY'), 7, 4), NULL, NULL, LCLI.DATECREATION, SYSDATE, CASE LCLI.CODEMAJSTAT WHEN 1 THEN SYSDATE ELSE NULL END, NULL, NULL, LCLI.EMAIL, LCLI.NBECHECEMAIL, NULL, LCLI.DATECREACARTE, CASE WHEN LCLI.CODEMAJCARTE = 1 AND LCLI.DATESUPPRESSION > TRUNC(SYSDATE) THEN LCLI.DATESUPPRESSION ELSE TO_DATE('31/12/2099', 'DD/MM/YYYY') END, NULL, PK_BIBLIO.RETOURNEMATCHCODE (LCLI.NOM), NULL, PK_BIBLIO.RETOURNEMATCHCODE (LCLI.PRENOM), NULL, NULL, LBM_RETOURNE_CODEADRESSE (LCLI.NUMID, LCLI.TYPERECHERCHE,LCLI.APPLISOURCE), NULL, NULL, CASE WHEN LCLI.CODECARTE IS NOT NULL AND (LCLI.DATESUPPCARTE > TRUNC(SYSDATE) OR LCLI.DATESUPPCARTE IS NULL ) THEN 'VAL' WHEN LCLI.CODECARTE IS NOT NULL AND LCLI.DATESUPPCARTE <= TRUNC(SYSDATE) THEN 'NCA' ELSE 'NCA' END, NULL, NULL, NULL, LCLI.NBECHECSMS, LCLI.IDENTIFICATIONDEMANDEE, LCLI.CODECLIENTEXTERNE, LCLI.CLIENTCOMPTE, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, LCLI.BLOCAGEIDENTCLI, LCLI.NUMID, LCLI.CODEMAJCLIENT FROM LBM_CLIENTS LCLI INNER JOIN LBM_MESSAGE_ID LMI ON LCLI.MESSAGEID = LMI.ID_MESSAGE AND LMI.ID_BATCH_STL = :B1

SELECT NOMTABLE,CODECLIENT,CIVILITE,NOM,PRENOM,DATENAISSANCE,NOMJEUNEFILLE ,ADRESSE,COMPLEMENTADRESSE,CODEPOSTAL,VILLE,PAYS,TELEPHONE,MOBILE,EMAIL,NOFAX,TYPECLIENT,LTYPECLIENT,CODETYPEPERSONNEL,LIBTYPEPERSONNEL,DATEDERNIERACHAT,OPTIN,CODECLIENTRATTACHEMENT,DATECREATION,DATEMODIFICATION,DATESUPPRESSION,CODETYPECARTEFIDELITECLIENT,LIBTYPECARTEFIDELITECLIENT,CODECARTEFIDELITECLIENT,DATECREATIONCARTE,DATEATTRIBUTIONCARTE,DATESUPPRESSIONCARTE,CODEETATCARTEFIDELITECLIENT,LIBETATCARTEFIDELITECLIENT,CODEAXESTAT,LIBAXESTATISTIQUECLIENT,CODETYPEAXESTATISTIQUECLIENT,CODEELEMENTSTAT,LIBELEMENTSTATCLIENT,VALEURAXESTATISTIQUECLIENT,SOCIETE,JOURDEVENTE,CAISSE,TICKET FROM LBM_CLIENT_BTS_VIEW WHERE TOP_BTS = 2 and substr(codeclient,1,3) <> '993'
UPDATE LBM_MESSAGE_ID SET ID_BATCH_STL = :B1 WHERE ((NVL(ID_BATCH_STL,0)= 0) OR (ID_BATCH_STL < 0)) AND TYPEFLUX = 'CLI'

UPDATE /*+ INDEX(VENTES_ARTICLE_MAG_PERIODE VENTES_ARTICLE_MAG_PERIODE_PK) */ VENTES_ARTICLE_MAG_PERIODE SET VOLVENTES = VOLVENTES + :B13 , CABRUTTTC = CABRUTTTC + :B12 , MTTVA = MTTVA + :B11 , MTREMISES = MTREMISES + :B10 , MTSURMARQUES = MTSURMARQUES + :B9 , MTSOLDES = MTSOLDES + :B8 , VALACHATHT = VALACHATHT + :B7 WHERE CODETYPEPERIODE = :B6 AND CODESAISON = :B5 AND CODEINTERNEARTICLE = :B4 AND DATEDEBUT = :B3 AND DATEFIN = :B2 AND CODEMAGASIN = :B1

SELECT /*+ INDEX(Stats_Produit_Coloris) */ SPC.CODEAXESTAT, SPC.CODEELEMENTSTAT, SPC.CODECOLORIS FROM STATS_PRODUIT_COLORIS SPC, AXES_STATISTIQUES A, ELEMENTS_STATISTIQUES ELT WHERE SPC.CODEPRODUIT = :B2 AND SPC.CODECOLORIS IN ('0', :B1 ) AND SPC.CODEELEMENTSTAT <> 0 AND A.CODEAXESTAT = SPC.CODEAXESTAT AND (A.DATEFINVALIDITE > TRUNC(SYSDATE) OR A.DATEFINVALIDITE IS NULL) AND A.CONSOLIDATIONDONNEES = 1 AND ELT.CODEAXESTAT = SPC.CODEAXESTAT AND ELT.CODEELEMENTSTAT = SPC.CODEELEMENTSTAT AND (ELT.DATEFINVALIDITE > TRUNC(SYSDATE) OR ELT.DATEFINVALIDITE IS NULL) ORDER BY SPC.CODEAXESTAT, SPC.CODECOLORIS DESC
